infos.value: If it isn't th' younger prince Sterne and Queen Helena...
I vow to exterminate every last one o' that putrid Leonis bloodline.
I'll start by soaking th' soil o' Leonis with th' blood of yer two.
Just like that?
I don't claim to know or really care what you're up to...
But the king of Hourne ordered me not to mess with these two, right?
Does Hourne frighten yer?
Quite the opposite. You intend to eventually bare your fangs at Hourne too, don't you?
Heh heh heh. We'll see, won't we?
It's a shame that you can't afford to betray Hourne then, isn't it?
...Oh? And why would that be?
You've left us armed, completely underestimating us.
...So what do yer plan on doing?
Wiping your blood from my blade!
Will yer now?
It seems yer missed th' reason why I left yer armed.
That way, if yer start a rebellion, we'll have no choice but to shut it down with our military force. Heh heh heh.
I don't care what you were planning.
...Master.
Hah hah hah! This has gotten quite interesting!
«Fortem», to arms!
